description:
We are a sales automation startup helping our customers finding the perfect leads at the right time, and automating their outreach to those leads. To do so, we leverage ML algorithms and generative AI at scale.

We're looking for a DevOps engineer, ideally with some experience around MLOps and data engineering, to help us set up and manage our Opensearch and Weaviate clusters, and generally manage our infrastructure on GCP.

---

I'm Olivier, the CTO of TelescopeAI, a Sequoia backed startup based in London. We expect responsive communication, high quality code and initiative from the freelancers working with us. The work will be split in smaller tasks to ensure we are satisfied with the results early on. Looking forward to receive your application:)
